pkgmetadata.longdescription: Team and repository tags========================.. image:: http://governance.openstack.org/badges/neutron-dynamic-routing.svg :target: http://governance.openstack.org/reference/tags/index.html.. Change things from this point onThis package contains neutron-dynamic-routing code which depends upon neutronand it's related libraries to run.Project Resources=================The homepage for Neutron is: https://launchpad.net/neutron. Use thissite for asking for help, and filing bugs. We use a single launchpadpage for all Neutron projects.Code is available on opendev.org at:https://opendev.org/openstack/neutron-dynamic-routingRefer to Neutron documentation for more information:`Neutron README.rst <https://opendev.org/openstack/neutron/src/branch/master/README.rst>`_Release notes for the project can be found at:https://docs.openstack.org/releasenotes/neutron-dynamic-routing/
